article_title: LeBron James ‘Forgiveness’ tees fly off Cleveland shelves
article_text: - Cleveland retailers watching LeBron James merchandise, particularly the popular “Forgiveness” t-shirt, sell out are not holding grudges against the basketball star who left to play for the Miami Heat four years ago. ()
